@Anubisisking: If you like to make some stupid "first letter of each line" joke, at least make sure to say something actually sensated... What does "is there A situation where you would pay it's convoke cost?" means? Convoke isn't a cost of sort, it's like a discount actually! And with "it's not going to Kill someone before at least 4 turns or so" do you mean that you're playing with a deck with 56 lands and 4 Siege Wurms?

You can drop this in the 4th turn even with a regular hand, so I don't think it's so bad... It's balanced and well-designed. I can see me play this card in some casual mono-green or GW deck!

4/5

posts.post_content:
Turn 1) Forest, [Skyshroud Ranger](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Skyshroud Ranger)  
Turn 2) Forest, use Skyshroud Ranger's ability, [Wood Elves](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wood Elves)  
Turn 3) Forest, convoke [Skyshroud Ranger](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Skyshroud Ranger) and [Wood Elves](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wood Elves) to play Siege Wurm  
Turn 4) [Blanchwood Armor](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Blanchwood Armor) or [Canopy Cover](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Canopy Cover) on Siege Wurm  
And that's usually how I play Siege Wurm.

Posted By: leomistico (8/1/2011 8:56:49 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Lately, one of my friends was running this in a wurm deck he had, but he was new to the game.  
Only a new player would play this, but for a new player, this card is pretty awesome.  
One: it can be cheap, and two, it can trample, I just wish that it worked with   
Kaalia of the vast so I could get it out easier... but being neither an angel, dragon or demon, or red, it   
Sucks. But honestly, I dont know why I would want to use it with Kaalia, seeing as it has NO ETB abilities.  
Look, I really really wish I could like this card, as it seems cool, and I guess I would use it in draft, but  
I just can't really get over the 7 mana. Seeing as, by itself, and in a vacuum, it's not going to   
Kill someone before at least 4 turns or so, that means that they have plenty of time to deal with your non-  
Effecient threat. And 7 turns to deal with you, provided you don't have ramp (I mean, honestly, is there   
A situation where you would pay it's convoke cost? Not likely)   
Please, I know I stated this card was... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
